Html:
Hi Ohan.

 I try to compile the ALVARWrapper1.3 like the Installation Guide, in the Visual C++ Express but the process has errors...


 1>------ Build started: Project: ALVARWrapper1.3, Configuration: Release Win32 ------
                                              1>Compiling...
 1>cl : Command line warning D9035 : option 'Wp64' has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release
 1>MarkerDetectorWrapper.cpp
 1>.\MarkerDetectorWrapper.cpp(36) : fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'MarkerDetector.h': No such file or directory
 1>Build log was saved at "file://c:\Documents and Settings\Goblin
 1>ALVARWrapper1.3 - 1 error(s), 1 warning(s)
 ========== Build: 0 succeeded, 1 failed, 0 up-to-date, 0 skipped ==========


 Where i'm worng?

 Sorry by the english...

Make sure you properly set your include path in the solution property. The MarkeDecetor.h header file is included in the distribution of ALVAR, and you need to configure the ALVARWraper project to point to ALVAR's include directory so it knows where to find the header file.

Hi! Thanks for your reply.... i guess i found my error...

Thanks again.
